projects.title: Architecture Bureau Website
description: I used just HTML and CSS for this project.
The website lets you connect with designers and architects and request your desired interior design for any space you have in mind.

projects.title: DJ1 Robot Navigation
description: In this project I used Python to teach the DJ1 Robot to do stuff.
I made a tricky course with three rooms, each with its own surprises. The robot went in, took pictures, and did things based on what it saw.

projects.title: React Workout Planner
description: You pick which muscles you want to work on, and the app gives you a list of exercises. You can choose your exercises, and then it makes a plan for you.

projects.title: React Feedback App
description: You can use this app to encourage users to leave feedback about your services. Users can add, delete, and change their feedback.

projects.title: React Expenses App
description: This app you can use to keep track of your everyday expenses. You can add, delete, change expenses and put them into different categories.
Insights page shows a graph which can help you keep an eye on your money goals.
